column4: For some reason I'm getting a lot of 404 messages on an apt-get update, when I try to apt-get install, it tells me packages are not authorized. I tried adding a new sources.list, but even from different sources I get the same 404 errors. Any idea what it could be?
can you pastebin the output of:  sudo apt-get update; lsb_release -a
yeah, sorry. Is it web active

I installed it completely last weekend, then wednesday mysql-server wouldn't boot because of a mysql.host missing, then i tried to fix it but, figured I might as well reinstall it, but I couldn't reinstall it anymore
can you web browse to http://de.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/natty/ on the same pc?
it seems the problem persists with any sources.list
Same problem with that sources list, just lots of 404 not found, even though they all are 100% correct
Any more ideas what the problem could be?
